actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Commerce to approve and distribute to food service operations instructions for removing food which has become lodged in a person's throat.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Commerce, upon recommendation of the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare, to approve and distribute to food service operations instructions for removing food which has become lodged in a person's throat. Prohibits any United States court from entering a judgment against any person for attempting to remove food lodged in any person's throat if such individual acted in accordance with instructions approved by the Secretary of Commerce.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Commerce to approve and distribute to food service operations instructions for removing food which has become lodged in a person's throat.
